posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: April 13, 2017 at 7:53 PM#2https://support.actlighting.com/knowledgeBase/11662803As for assigning SpeedMaster via command line, there is a bug in 3.2 that makes this not work properly. You should be able to assign it to the effect though (rather than the exec itself), using the syntax listed in the bulletin above.
